alert.note: Alert for Lawrence (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 07 at 12:17PM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Lawrence County through 1245 PM CDT... At 1217 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles west of Moulton, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Moulton, Mt Hope, Wren, Landersville and Bankhead National Forest. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
